humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are 8 lymph nodes examined, and metastatic carcinoma is found in 2 out of these 8 lymph nodes. This corresponds to the N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system, as per Rule 9 and New Rule 12 (N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes). The report also mentions extranodal extension, but this does not change the N stage in this case.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma to two out of eight lymph nodes with extranodal extension. This is consistent with a pathologic N1 stage (pN1a) according to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging system.
